name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab reopen key on incognito mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to configure {Ctrl+Shift+T} to reopen both normal and Incognito tabs and windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*Ensure that you configure the {Ctrl+Shift+T} shortcut key in the settings page by visiting chrome://extensions/shortcuts

*Enable "Allow in incognito" to ensure the extension works in both normal and Incognito modes.

**Important: Do not use Chrome's built-in restore functionality anymore, as it may cause inconsistencies with the restore tree maintained internally by the extension.

*It is recommended to restart Chrome after installing the extension to ensure it functions properly.


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
History

- Modified explanation

v1.1.0
- Fixed an issue where the incognito window and tab were not restored when the window had only one tab and was closed with closing the last tab.
- Set icon
- Modified description

v1.0.0
Initial release
